This is the course website for SOC 179FS (Fall 2019), a [FOCUS cluster](https://focus.duke.edu/focus-program) first-year seminar taught at [Duke University](http://duke.edu). The course teaches you the how and why of visualizing social science data using modern tools. It also explores various efforts to systematically represent social structure and social relations in a visually coherent manner. Learn more by reading [the syllabus](syllabus/) and the [schedule](schedule/).
